value.name: THE REHEARSAL [case of MAZZEL]
value.overview:
REHEASAL is “the moment when a performance is completed”

In THE REHEASAL, Space Shower TV infiltrates the rehearsals where the artists are creating the stage, and delivers the scene as the showcase is being refined and completed.

This time, we will spotlight MAZZEL, a new generation dance and vocal group that will release their 2nd single "Carnival" on October 18th.

Since their spectacular debut in May 2023, how will the showcase of eight people who captivate us with their overwhelming performances and worldviews be completed?

Enjoy those moments that we don't usually get to see.
